Package etomica.math.numerical

Class AkimaSpline

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.math.numerical.AkimaSpline

  • public class AkimaSpline
extends java.lang.Object
    DataProcessor that interpolates incoming data using an Akima spline interpolation scheme. "A New Method of Interpolation and Smooth Curve Fitting Based on Local Procedures", H. Akima, JACM 17 (1970), 589
